items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.
items.title: simstudioai/sim: Sim Studio is an open-source agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: DOM Manipulator is a lightweight and flexible JavaScript library that enables full control over the DOM with minimal HTML and CSS. Designed for developers building dynamic and programmatic web interfaces, it offers powerful features like style management, animation queues, and child element handling, making it ideal for modern web applications.
items.title: vugarsafarzada/domate: DOM Manipulator is a lightweight and flexible JavaScript library that enables full control over the DOM with minimal HTML and CSS. Designed for developers building dynamic and programmatic web interfaces, it offers powerful features like style management, animation queues, and child element handling, making it ideal for modern web applications.

items.content_html: FileFlow is a lightweight, Blazor-based web app for secure peer-to-peer file sharing. It uses end-to-end encryption and real-time transfer via WebRTC and SignalR — all without cloud storage, file size limits, or user accounts.
items.title: MSUMusketeers/P2PFileTransfer: FileFlow is a lightweight, Blazor-based web app for secure peer-to-peer file sharing. It uses end-to-end encryption and real-time transfer via WebRTC and SignalR — all without cloud storage, file size limits, or user accounts.
